Articles.Content:
Recently I've been looking for a mod which adds more screens and operable buttons to the IVA view but I've found none for KSP 1.2.0.
Could you recommend me some.
P.D. Please with links to the page to download the <.zip> file.

The mod you're looking for is Raster Prop Monitor.

The download can be found by scrolling down here: https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/releases/
